message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I appreciate your offer, but I think the price is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I can't go as low as $12,000, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still not comfortable with $17,000. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product, which I think is a fair price considering its value.
